themes: artist support based on artistic merit
diverse and knowledgeable panel for judging art
critique of bureaucratic metrics and decision-makers
key_phrases: more support for all Austin artists based on their work
judged by a diverse panel of leaders in the Austin art scene
not a clueless metric imposed by city bureacrats who don't actually look at art
barriers_identified: clueless metric imposed by city bureacrats
lack of engagement from decision-makers with the art scene
solutions_proposed: support artists based on their work
use a diverse panel of knowledgeable art leaders for judging
